title: Will I receive end of season rewards?
body: I believe I was banned for two weeks some time before 8/22/17 (8/15 I believe), but the ban was active during 8/22/17. Will I still receive rewards?

replies.body: The ban will only disqualify you if it happens *after* 8/22. Since it happened before then, you shouldn't be disqualified.
The way I read it, the rule is about bans **issued** from 8/22 forward. If this is the case, you'll still receive rewards; I think that's the case. I'm not a Rito employee tho'.
